# Renewal (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Angharradh, Chauntea, Finder Wyvernspur, Kossuth, Lathander, Shiallia, Silvanus |

**Granted Powers (Su):** If you fall below 0 hit points, you regain a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your Charisma modifier. This ability functions once per day. If an attack brings you to –10 hit points or lower, you die before this power takes effect.

**Renewal Domain Spells**

**1 [[Charm Person (Spell)|Charm Person]]:** Makes one person your friend.

**2 [[Restoration, Lesser (Spell)|Restoration, Lesser]]:** Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

**3 [[Remove Disease (Spell)|Remove Disease]]:** Cures all diseases affecting subject.

**4 [[Reincarnate (Spell)|Reincarnate]]:** Brings dead subject back to life in random body.

**5 [[Atonement (Spell)|Atonement]] <sup>FX</sup>:** Removes burden of misdeeds from subject.

**6 [[Heroes' Feast (Spell)|Heroes’ Feast]]:** Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

**7 [[Restoration, Greater (Spell)|Restoration, Greater]] <sup>X</sup>:** As *[[Restoration (Spell)|restoration]]*, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

**8 [[Polymorph Any Object (Spell)|Polymorph Any Object]]:** Changes any subject into anything else.

**9 [[Freedom (Spell)|Freedom]]:** Releases creature from imprisonment.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 279 |

| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 90 |
